# Network Patterns Test Fixture
# Contains realistic network patterns for testing detection
# Includes IP addresses, internal hostnames, cloud storage URLs, etc.

# ===== IPv4 Addresses =====
# Standard IPv4
server_ip = "192.168.1.100"
api_server = "10.0.0.50"
load_balancer: "172.16.0.1"
external_ip = "203.0.113.42"

# IPv4 with Port
db_host = "192.168.1.100:5432"
redis_server = "10.0.0.25:6379"
api_endpoint: "172.16.0.100:8080"
service_addr = "203.0.113.50:443"

# ===== Private IP Ranges (RFC 1918) =====
# Class A (10.x.x.x)
internal_server = "10.0.0.1"
dev_machine = "10.255.255.254"
staging_host: "10.100.50.25"

# Class B (172.16-31.x.x)
vpc_host = "172.16.0.1"
container_ip = "172.31.255.254"
k8s_node: "172.20.10.100"

# Class C (192.168.x.x)
home_server = "192.168.0.1"
office_printer = "192.168.1.254"
local_dev: "192.168.100.50"

# ===== IPv6 Addresses =====
# Full IPv6
ipv6_server = "2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334"
ipv6_host: "fe80:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0001"

# Compressed IPv6
ipv6_short = "2001:db8:85a3::8a2e:370:7334"
link_local: "fe80::1"
loopback_v6 = "::1"

# ===== MAC Addresses =====
# Standard format (colon-separated)
mac_address = "00:1A:2B:3C:4D:5E"
device_mac: "AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF"
network_card = "a1:b2:c3:d4:e5:f6"

# Hyphen-separated format
mac_hyphen = "00-1A-2B-3C-4D-5E"
nic_mac: "AB-CD-EF-01-23-45"

# Cisco format (dot-separated)
mac_cisco = "001a.2b3c.4d5e"
switch_port: "aabb.ccdd.eeff"

# ===== Internal Hostnames =====
# Various internal domain suffixes
internal_api = "api.internal"
dev_server = "dev-server.local"
staging_db = "staging-db.private"
corp_ldap = "ldap.corp"
intranet_site = "intranet.example.corp"
home_nas = "nas.home"
docker_host = "registry.lan"
test_server = "test.localdomain"

# Environment-prefixed internal names
prod_api = "prod.api.internal"
staging_web = "staging.webapp.local"
dev_db = "dev.database.private"

# ===== Cloud Storage URLs =====
# AWS S3 - Virtual-hosted style
s3_bucket = "https://my-bucket.s3.amazonaws.com/path/to/file"
s3_regional = "https://data-bucket.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/data.json"
s3_url: "https://assets.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/"

# AWS S3 - Path style
s3_path = "https://s3.amazonaws.com/my-bucket/key"
s3_regional_path = "https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production-bucket/backup.tar.gz"

# AWS S3 - ARN format
s3_arn = "arn:aws:s3:::my-bucket/my-key"
bucket_arn: "arn:aws:s3:::production-assets/data/"

# Azure Blob Storage
azure_blob = "https://mystorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/container/blob"
blob_url: "https://devstorage.blob.core.windows.net/uploads/file.pdf"

# Azure Storage (various services)
azure_file = "https://mystorageaccount.file.core.windows.net/share/file"
azure_queue = "https://mystorageaccount.queue.core.windows.net/myqueue"
azure_table = "https://mystorageaccount.table.core.windows.net/mytable"

# Google Cloud Storage - Path style
gcs_path = "https://storage.googleapis.com/my-bucket/object"
gcs_url: "https://storage.googleapis.com/production-data/exports/data.csv"

# Google Cloud Storage - Virtual-hosted style
gcs_virtual = "https://my-bucket.storage.googleapis.com/path/to/object"

# Google Cloud Storage - gsutil format
gcs_gsutil = "gs://my-bucket/path/to/file"
gsutil_path: "gs://data-lake/raw/2024/01/data.parquet"

# ===== Localhost References =====
# localhost with ports
local_api = "http://localhost:3000/api"
local_db = "http://localhost:5432"
dev_server: "https://localhost:8443/admin"

# 127.0.0.1 references
loopback = "http://127.0.0.1:8080"
local_redis = "127.0.0.1:6379"
debug_server: "http://127.0.0.1/debug"

# IPv6 localhost
ipv6_local = "http://[::1]:8080"
v6_loopback: "http://[::1]/api"

# ===== URLs with Credentials =====
# HTTP URLs with embedded credentials
api_with_creds = "https://admin:password123@api.example.com/v1"
service_url = "http://user:secret@internal-service.local:8080/api"

# FTP URLs with credentials
ftp_server = "ftp://ftpuser:ftppass@files.example.com/uploads"
backup_ftp: "ftp://backup:s3cr3t@ftp.internal.corp/backups/"

# ===== Kubernetes and Docker Patterns =====
# Kubernetes service URLs
k8s_svc = "redis.default.svc.cluster.local"
api_svc = "api-server.production.svc.cluster.local"
db_service: "postgres.database.svc"
kube_dns = "kube-dns.kube-system.svc.cluster.local"

# Docker internal host
docker_host = "host.docker.internal"
DOCKER_HOST=host.docker.internal
